0:
”Alexa, unlock the door lock.”
”Alexa,unlock my door lock”
”Alexa,lock my door lock”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hardware Requirements:
1. Sciener Smart Lock
2. Gateway - sold separately
3. Echo/Dot

Get Started:

1. Check that the Sciener app is able to lock/unlock using Bluetooth.

2. Check that the Sciener app is able to “remotely” lock/unlock using the Sciener Plus hub

3. Enable the Sciener Smart Home skill in Alexa

4. Link the Sciener Smart Lock account and provide permission to access your locks.

5. Once Alexa discovers the Sciener Smart Lock, you can issue voice commands to Alexa as outlined below:

Alexa, lock the door lock
(door lock is the name of smart lock,you can rename the smart lock in the Sciener app)
Alexa, unlock the door lock
(you should enable unlock feature in Alexa app)

Notice:some locks dose not support unlock or lock status report, the status will always be locked.
